stories.original_headline: Scientists discover why high altitude protects against diabetes
stories.original_summary: Living at high altitude appears to protect against diabetes, and scientists have finally discovered the reason. When oxygen levels drop, red blood cells switch into a new metabolic mode and absorb large amounts of glucose from the blood. This helps the body cope with thin air while also reducing blo
stories.fantasy_headline: The Mountain Alchemists Uncover Secret to Thriving at High Peaks!
stories.fantasy_story: Alchemists from the Sky-Kingdoms have finally learned why folks dwelling on high mountain peaks often avoid a common ailing sickness. When the very air thins, the body's tiny life-force essences shift, drinking up excess sweet ambrosia from the blood. This ancient magic helps them endure thin air and keeps their vitality strong.

stories.original_headline: Generative AI analyzes medical data faster than human research teams
stories.original_summary: Researchers tested whether generative AI could handle complex medical datasets as well as human experts. In some cases, the AI matched or outperformed teams that had spent months building prediction models. By generating usable analytical code from precise prompts, the systems dramatically reduced t
stories.fantasy_headline: Enchanted Orbs Outpace Scribe-Wizards in Reading Healer's Scrolls!
stories.fantasy_story: The Arcane Guild has unveiled new enchanted orbs capable of deciphering vast collections of healer's scrolls faster than any scribe-wizard team. These magical artifacts matched or even surpassed sages who spent moons crafting prognostic charts. By conjuring spell-weaving scripts from mere whispers, the orbs greatly shortened the time to understand ailments.
